title: Nervous Sleeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Follow a player at night. Your ability is mandatory.
- Stay home at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target visits someone who dies, deal an Unstoppable attack to them. If they visit you and you die, you will not attack them.
- If you stay home, you will instead attack your visitors.
- If you attack a Townie, you cannot act the next night. The first time you do this, degrade to Powerful attack.
- You may only stay home twice.

desc:
Post 2
*You do not sleep. You hunger, and you shall forever.*
